## New Feature: Latency Guard (Audio-Friendly GPU Mode)

### Hardware Accelerated GPU Scheduling (HAGS)
- Displays current HAGS status: **On / Off / Unknown**
- One-click toggle to enable or disable HAGS
- Writes directly to  
  `HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\GraphicsDrivers\HwSchMode`
- Clear reboot requirement shown to the user for changes to take effect

### Ollama Runtime Configuration
- Automatically detects whether Ollama is currently running
- Configurable runtime parameters:
  - `OLLAMA_NUM_CTX` (context size)
  - `OLLAMA_NUM_PARALLEL` (parallelism)
- Settings are applied as **persistent user environment variables**
- **Apply & Restart Ollama** action cleanly stops and restarts Ollama with updated configuration
- Tuned defaults for audio stability:
  - Context Size: **2048**
  - Parallelism: **1**

### GPU & Latency Monitoring
- Live sampling of GPU load and DPC latency
- Displays top GPU-consuming processes in real time
- Operates independently of Essentials scripts for lightweight monitoring

### Low-Latency Profile Actions
- Apply and revert an app-managed low-latency profile:
  - Trims GPU effects
  - Adjusts refresh behavior
  - Optional model/runtime throttling
- Live status indicators reflect the currently applied latency mode
